SigridDialogue1: ^[You prepare to knock on the lighthouse entrance...]
^[...but someone opens the door before your fist can reach it.]
^Don't look so alarmed, I saw you approaching from the top of the lighthouse.
^I don't recognize you at all. You new here?

g-0: ^I'm Cleo. I'm... sort of just passing by, really.
^What brings you here? I'm not usually one to receive guests.
g-1: ^I need to upgrade my boat. Bengt told me to come see you.
^I gotta admit, I'm a little hesitant to deal with a total stranger.
^Nothing personal, of course. Just not used to outsiders is all.
g-2: ^What if I helped you out with something first?
^Lucky you, I do need help with something right now.
^I stay up late a lot, and for me to do that, I need coffee.
^Bengt has the best coffee around here. I refuse to drink anything else.
^I want you to head to Bengt and get me some. Think you're up for it?

c-3: ^Why only Bengt's coffee? Can't I ask anyone else?
^Ulrich only drinks tea, Irma's coffee is too weak, and Vera's is too... eccentric.
^She puts some weird... fish goo in it or whatever.
^She says it's for nutrition, but it tastes real funky. And slimey. It's gross.
^Yeah. Ask her if you want to know what on earth she puts in there.
